title: PPTminimizer.3.0.REPACK-miniyou
description:
REPACK REASON: The registration thing got screwed up, this release
should work though. If you encounter any problems, please make a
comment or send me a mail.


Name: PPTminimizer
Sys req: Win 98 or newer
Company: Balesio
Price: 29.95? or free, it&#039;s up to you



PPTminimizer: The fat burner for your PowerPoint presentations
Reduce your PowerPoint file size with PPTminimizer by up to 96%
Your advantages:
-    Optimization of multiple .PPT, .PPS, .POT, .PPTX, .PPTM,
        .PPSX, .PPSM, .POTX and .POTM files at the same time
-    No uncompressing necessary (unzip)
-    The minimized files are totally re-editable
-    User friendly interface
-    Send your presentations with Outlook and other
        E-mail clients with just 1 click
-    Improve the loading times of your presentations
-    Reduce your network&#039;s bandwidth of capacity 
-    Minimize and send by E-mail with just 1 click
-    No PowerPoint installation necessary



Originally released on TPB by miniyou,
but I couldn&#039;t care less about what you do
with it as long as you keep seeding until
you have a nice ratio.
